Title: Royo Poster #23 Black Tinkerbell
Body (HTML):
Fantasy Art Poster: Not every fairy is perfect and here to prove she is a little more naughty than nice is Luis Royo's, "Black Tinkerbell".

As the sun sets on her dark an eerie world, she sits seductively with her legs wide apart as she nibbles her fingers and stare intensely in your direction. Wearing only a pitch black bikini, she sits holding a deadly weapon and trying her best to look innocent along the way. Will you fall into the arms of the dark or can you see the light?

Perfect for any fantasy art lover!

27.5" x 19.75" on linen paper

Title: Royo Poster #18 The Time Has Come
Body (HTML):
Fantasy Art Poster: Well known around the world for his detailed and sensuous drawings of women, Spanish fantasy artist Luis Royo is sure to please fans with the beautiful image featured on this magnificent poster. Entitled 'The Time Has Come', the scene depicts a lone woman with flowing long hair, who is draped in a flowing black cloak and clutches a long, silver sword in her hand. She looks down over the orange glow of fire, with dramatic, thick smoke almost hiding the moon in the sky.

Linen Paper19.75" x 27.5"
Image Alt Text: Royo Poster #18 The Time Has Come

Title: Corben DEN poster
Body (HTML):
Limited Edition Print (19" x 24") by Richard Corben

 

 The artist I most want to aspire to is Richard Corben. His style is visual and it tells the story just as you see it... ...my favorite is Corben. I love everything he does, I love his stuff ...he_s an amazing artist. 

_Guillermo del Toro

Title: Achilleos - 1981 Movie Poster
Body (HTML):
19" x 24"

Chris Achilleos, artist and illustrator, has created some of the best-loved fantasy and glamour art of the past thirty years. His work ranges from this stunning image of Taarna, the famous Heavy Metal heroine, through classic Conan covers and Amazonian women to his more recent fetish paintings, all the time experimenting with new techniques and different materials.

Title: Sire poster - Biker Chick
Body (HTML):
by Denis Sire

24" x 18"

Denis Sire made his comic debut in M_tal Hurlant and has continued his career with Heavy Metal. For this Metal Hurlant, he created amongst others 'Menace diabolique', 'Bois Willys', '6 T M_lodie' and 'Lisa Bay'. In 1987, he created the 'Best of Racing', an album that appeared at Art Moderne. After some appearances in Zoulou and l'_cho des Savanes he created 'Ziblyne et Bettie'. In 1997, he worked with Jean-Pierre Dionnet on 'l'_le des Amazones', again in L'_cho des Savanes.

Also check out the Art of Denis Sire

Title: Horley poster - Cop Girl
Body (HTML):
by Alex Horley

18" x 24"

Alex Horley_s artistic talent knows no boundaries. He has a solid foundation in traditional art with a superior eye for light, color, camera placement and composition. He is well known for his diverse visual range in regards to concept design, exceptional human and creature anatomy, ability to depict action and strong story and sequence development. His distinctive compelling imagery leaps from the page and has earned him the reputation of one of today_s top creative visionaries who is finding an ever-expanding audience through his work in heavy metal as well as other venues.

Also Check out Angel Wings

Title: Alfonso Azpiri poster
Body (HTML):
19" x 24" Limited edition of 500

Alfonso Azpiri Mejia, born in Madrid, is a specialist in the fantastic erotic comic genre. He began his career in the early 1970s in the magazine Trinca, including the stories 'Do Fugitivos en Malasia'. He was also presented in Cimoc with 'Zephyd' and 'Lorna y su Robot', in 1984 with 'Pesadillas' and in Comix Internacional with 'El Comic Vivo'.He created several books about horror, sex and nudity, which were aimed at the Italian market, including 'Terror Blu', 'Il Vampiro', and 'I Notturni'. His best known characters is 'Lorna', a Barbarella-like heroin, and the martial arts detective Chang, whose adventures first appeared in several French magazines.

Heavy Metal publishes the complete Lorna lineup in English.

Julie Bell: Her first published cover for Heavy Metal magazine broke ground for other illustrators with the introduction of her now legendary Metal Flesh. Her hyper-realistic style is known for its sexy, powerful images of warriors and amazons and a sensitive, exquisite use of color and texture.
